[Elemental: #92IWind?@Elemental Value: #188I1]
Prevent enemy arts with 20% success.

Quartz.name: Impede 2
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #92IWind?@Elemental Value: #188I3]
Prevent enemy arts with 50% success.

Quartz.name: Impede 3
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #92IWind?@Elemental Value: #188I5]
Prevent enemy arts with 80% success.

Quartz.name: Cast 1
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #93ITime?@Elemental Value: #189I1]
Time to cast arts is cut.

Quartz.name: Cast 2
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #93ITime?@Elemental Value: #189I3]
Time to cast arts is greatly cut.

Quartz.name: Scent
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #92IWind?@Elemental Value: #188I3 #190I2]
Enemies become aware of presence.

Quartz.name: Eagle Eye
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #94ISpace?@Elemental Value: #190I3 #191I2]
Can see enemies from a distance.

Quartz.name: Haze
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #95IMirage?@Elemental Value: #185I2 #191I3]
Enemies become unaware of presence.

Quartz.name: Heal
Quartz.description:
[Elemental: #90IWater?@Elemental Value: #186I3 #189I2]
HP slowly recovers by walking.

Quest Items.name: Guild Referral
Quest Items.description:
A referral from the guild addressed to the owner of the
Perzel Farm.

Quest Items.name: Mayor's Referral
Quest Items.description:
A referral from Mayor Klaus addressed to the mine chief at
the Malga Mine.

Quest Items.name: Elevator Key
Quest Items.description:
A key borrowed from one of the mine workers at the
Malga Mine to activate the elevator.

Quest Items.name: Septium Crystal
Quest Items.description: A septium crystal received from the mine chief.

Quest Items.name: Guild Referral
Quest Items.description:
A referral from the guild addressed to a Liberl News
reporter.

Quest Items.name: Quartz Fragment
Quest Items.description:
A broken piece of quartz.
It glows just like a nonfunctional piece of sepith.

Quest Items.name: Maintenance Kit
Quest Items.description:
A case of tools used to service lighthouses.
Inside is a complete set of tools and replacement parts.

Quest Items.name: Orbment Light
Quest Items.description:
A large orbment light used to replace burned out ones in
road lamps.

Quest Items.name: Father Divine's Letter
Quest Items.description:
A letter from Father Divine addressed to Father Holstein
in Bose.

Quest Items.name: Servais Leaf
Quest Items.description: A tree leaf found in the attic of the mayor's residence.

Quest Items.name: The Mayor's Letter
Quest Items.description:
A letter from Mayor Maybelle addressed to General Morgan
at the Haken Gate.

Quest Items.name: Abandoned Mine Key
Quest Items.description:
A key for the abandoned mine borrowed from Reisen,
the elder of Ravennue Village.

Quest Items.name: Gate Pass
Quest Items.description: A pass to enter the Bose region.

Quest Items.name: Recommendation
Quest Items.description:
A document awarded by the Rolent Bracer Guild recommending
advancement to bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Hundred Days War
Quest Items.description:
A book about the hidden truth behind the Hundred Days War
campaign.

Quest Items.name: Progressive Rod
Quest Items.description: A normal fishing pole which can be found anywhere.

Quest Items.name: Recommendation
Quest Items.description:
A document awarded by the Bose Bracer Guild recommending
advancement to bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Warehouse Key
Quest Items.description: A key found in Ruan's south block.

Quest Items.name: Torn Map
Quest Items.description:
A piece of an old sea chart found in a barrel washed up on
the beach of the Gull Seaside Way.

Quest Items.name: Letter to Cassius
Quest Items.description: A letter received from the guild addressed to Cassius Bright.

Quest Items.name: Bouquet
Quest Items.description: A standard present.

Quest Items.name: Black Notebook
Quest Items.description:
A notebook found inside a vacuum in the sky bandits'
hideout. Nonsensical rows of numbers are written inside.

Quest Items.name: Recommendation
Quest Items.description:
A document awarded by the Ruan Bracer Guild recommending
advancement to bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Recommendation
Quest Items.description:
A document awarded by the Zeiss Bracer Guild recommending
advancement to bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Recommendation
Quest Items.description:
A document awarded by the Grancel Bracer Guild recommending
advancement to bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Special Boxed Lunch
Quest Items.description: A sandwich and paella set with a free herbal tea included.

Quest Items.name: Ruan Economics I
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at the royal
academy. The 1st volume in a trilogy.

Quest Items.name: Ruan Economics II
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at the royal
academy. The 2nd volume in a trilogy.

Quest Items.name: Ruan Economics III
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at the royal
academy. The 3rd volume in a trilogy.

Quest Items.name: Kitty-Talk for Dummies
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at Zeiss Central
Factory. Contains candid kitty conversations. Meow.

Quest Items.name: Tomorrow's Cooking
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at Zeiss Central
Factory. It mainly speculates about the future of cooking.

Quest Items.name: Septium Optic Annals
Quest Items.description:
A book taken from the Material Archives at Zeiss Central
Factory. Collections of these are routinely published.

Quest Items.name: The Erbe Woodpecker
Quest Items.description:
A book found inside the stone lantern in the pond at Elmo
Village. From the Zeiss Central Factory Material Archives.

Quest Items.name: Hertz's Adventure II
Quest Items.description:
A book found near the strange stone pillars on Tratt Plains
Road. From the Zeiss Central Factory Material Archives.

Quest Items.name: 31 Cypress Trees
Quest Items.description:
A book found behind a barrel on the 3rd floor of the
Sanktheim Gate. From the Zeiss Central Factory Archives.

Quest Items.name: Drive Orbment
Quest Items.description:
A drive orbment which could be said to be the heart of a
haulage vehicle.

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 1
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [The Queen's Birthday is Approaching]
The 60th Anniversary - Preparations are Underway!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 2
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [The Airliner 'Linde' has Vanished!]
Accident? Incident? Details Inside!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 3
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Update! Disappearance of the Linde]
Ransom Note from Capua Family a.k.a. the Sky Bandits!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 4
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Sky Bandits Arrested! Missing Linde Case Solved!]
A First-Hand Account of the Foray!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 5
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Exclusive Interview with Colonel Richard]
The Royal Army's Rising Star! Personal Details Revealed!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 6
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Ruan City Mayor Arrested on Suspicion of Arson!]
Rampage of Incumbent Mayor! Motive Brought to Light!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 7
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Shock Over Incident at Zeiss Central Factory]
Daylight Attack - Terrorist a Member of the Royal Guard?!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 8
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [City Shaken Over Possible Sedition Conspiracy!]
Sudden Mistrust Falls on Elite Group!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Issue 9
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Victors Decided in Martial Arts Competition!]
The Fight is Over! - Crown Goes to an Unlikely Team!

Quest Items.name: Liberl News - Special
Quest Items.description:
S.C. 1202 [Intel's Coup D'etat Plot Thwarted!]
Full Report! Rescue Operation for Her Highness, the Queen!

Quest Items.name: Back Room Key
Quest Items.description:
A key found in the Factory Chief's office of the Zeiss
Central Factory.

Quest Items.name: Grancel Sewer Map
Quest Items.description:
A blueprint of the sewers running beneath the Royal City of
Grancel.

Quest Items.name: Dorothy's Photograph
Quest Items.description: A picture Dorothy took of the Leiston Fortress.

Quest Items.name: Leiston Fortress Map
Quest Items.description:
The schematics for Leiston Fortress.
(Obtained by secret means.)

Quest Items.name: Leiston Fortress Map
Quest Items.description:
The schematics for Leiston Fortress.
(Obtained by secret means.)

Quest Items.name: Black Orbment
Quest Items.description:
An obsidian-black orbment found in a package addressed to
Cassius.

Quest Items.name: Junior Bracer Emblem
Quest Items.description:
A junior bracer emblem awarded by the guild.
Identification of one's junior bracer status.

Quest Items.name: Bracer Emblem
Quest Items.description:
An emblem verifying bracer status awarded by the guild.
Has the official Bracer Guild symbol on its surface.

Quest Items.name: Letter to Faye
Quest Items.description:
A letter received from Private Brahm at the Wolf Fort
written with words of equivocal love.

Quest Items.name: Liberl Kingdom Map
Quest Items.description:
A map of the Liberl Kingdom.
It can be used to confirm one's current whereabouts.

Quest Items.name: Attn. Factory Chief
Quest Items.description:
A referral from the guild addressed to the head of
the central factory.

Quest Items.name: Detector Jammer
Quest Items.description:
A device invented by Professor Russell.
Capable of jamming detection sensors.

Quest Items.name: Orbal Calculator
Quest Items.description:
The orbal calculator, Capel, which was stolen from the
central factory.

Quest Items.name: Zemuria Moss
Quest Items.description:
A glowing moss gathered from the Kaldia Limestone Cave. It?fs
needed to make a remedy developed by the Septian Church.

Quest Items.name: Arve Sovereign Serum
Quest Items.description:
A remedy formulated from Zemuria moss.
It boosts the immune system to fight off toxic agents.

Quest Items.name: Gasoline Tank
Quest Items.description:
A tank filled with combustible liquid produced by the
Republic.

Quest Items.name: Combustion Engine
Quest Items.description:
A complex machine which changes thermal energy into kinetic
energy by burning fuel inside a metallic pipe.

Quest Items.name: Pump Shed Key
Quest Items.description:
A key borrowed from Mrs. Mao to the pump shed in Elmo
Village.

Quest Items.name: Boarding Pass
Quest Items.description:
A ticket for the airliner and a reserved seat to the Royal
City of Grancel.

Quest Items.name: Grand Arena Ticket
Quest Items.description: A spectator ticket for the Martial Arts Competition.

Quest Items.name: Julia's Letter
Quest Items.description:
A letter from 1st Lieutenant Schwarz addressed to Hilda,
the head maid at Grancel Castle.

Quest Items.name: Grancel Sewer Key A
Quest Items.description: A key to the sewer entrance in Grancel's west block.

Quest Items.name: Grancel Sewer Key B
Quest Items.description: A key to the sewer entrance in Grancel's east block.

Quest Items.name: Spare Key
Quest Items.description: A key to the main hall hidden in the gallery of the Erbe Royal Villa.

Quest Items.name: Boarding Pass
Quest Items.description:
A ticket for the airliner and a reserved seat to the Royal
City of Grancel.

Quest Items.name: Invitation
Quest Items.description:
An invitation to the royal banquet awarded by Duke von
Auslese as a prize for winning the Martial Arts Competition.

Quest Items.name: Registry Card
Quest Items.description:
A card indicating participation in the Martial Arts
Competition.

Quest Items.name: Small Box
Quest Items.description:
The item required to complete bracer practical training.
It is tightly sealed.

Quest Items.name: Hertz's Adventure I
Quest Items.description:
A book which can be read in the central factory Material
Archives but not taken.

Quest Items.name: Room 202 Key
Quest Items.description: A key to room 202 at Hotel Roenbaum.

Quest Items.name: Luke's Journal
Quest Items.description:
An account of Luke's day to day life as a bracer.
Shocking twist ending! Sadly, it can?ft be taken.

Ingredients.name: Firefly Fungus
Ingredients.description:
A suspiciously green, glowing mushroom.
It is rumored to be delectable if prepared right.

Ingredients.name: Acerbic Tomato
Ingredients.description:
A new species that arose as a byproduct of experimentation.
It is unimaginably bitter.

Ingredients.name: Bear Claw
Ingredients.description:
A thorny medicinal herb that looks like a bear?fs claw.
Often used in food and medicine.

Ingredients.name: Tri-Colored Rice
Ingredients.description:
A blend of red, yellow, and black husked rice.
Delightfully crunchy and often used in dishes in Liberl.

Ingredients.name: Aged Miso
Ingredients.description:
An Eastern seasoning made by fermenting steamed grains.
Has a pungent flavor and is great for health.

Ingredients.name: Vintage Wine
Ingredients.description:
A thoroughly aged, potent liquor.
It is highly regarded as a cooking wine for its rich aroma.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Milk
Ingredients.description:
Freshly drawn milk delivered daily from the farm.
Rolent?fs local brand is said to be especially tasty.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Eggs
Ingredients.description:
Newly laid eggs from free-range chickens.
A basic ingredient essential for cooking.

Ingredients.name: Sharp Cheese
Ingredients.description: Ripened cheese made from freshly drawn milk.

Ingredients.name: Luscious Orange
Ingredients.description:
A hand-picked fruit from a farming village.
Vivid orange like the setting sun.

Ingredients.name: Ripe Apple
Ingredients.description:
A succulent treat harvested after it has grown to maturity.
From the famous fruit orchards of the Village of Ravennue.

Ingredients.name: Azelia Fruit
Ingredients.description:
A fruit with a tough rind indigenous to the Ruan region.
It is mainly enjoyed in the form of juice.

Ingredients.name: Milled Flour
Ingredients.description:
The most basic of ingredients.
Neither pasta nor bread can be made without it.

Ingredients.name: Salted Anchovy
Ingredients.description:
A nonperishable rustic fish in a salty sauce. The ones from
Manoria Village are said to be top-quality.

Ingredients.name: Marbled Steak
Ingredients.description:
A mouthwatering cut of meat, tender and marbled with fat.
Great in dishes from stew to steak.

Ingredients.name: Flaky Potato
Ingredients.description:
A small succulent potato.
Great in boiled foods since it keeps its firmness.

Ingredients.name: Crisp Onion
Ingredients.description:
A large onion with a nice crunchy texture.
With almost no acrid taste, it can be eaten like an apple.

Ingredients.name: Dirty Carrot
Ingredients.description:
A sweet carrot great for cooking.
The dirt is used to keep it fresh.

Ingredients.name: Maple Sugar
Ingredients.description:
A natural sweetener made from boiled-down tree sap.
Its faint aroma can be used as an accent for foods.

Ingredients.name: Kibbled Salt
Ingredients.description:
Coarsely ground rock salt.
Rich in minerals, it carries a profound flavor.

Ingredients.name: Olive Oil
Ingredients.description:
Oil taken from the olives of a tree laden with fruit.
Essential to give that special touch to dishes.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Herb
Ingredients.description:
A sweet herb with a pleasant fragrance.
Its use varies from tea to even ridding meats of odors.

Ingredients.name: Dragon Beans
Ingredients.description:
Flavorful coffee beans native to Liberl.
The raw beans are used as a condiment.

Ingredients.name: Royal Leaf
Ingredients.description:
A popular tree leaf used as an extract since old times.
It?fs even used to flavor candy.

Ingredients.name: Black Pepper
Ingredients.description:
Whole black pepper.
An essential spice in meat dishes.

Ingredients.name: Red Pepper
Ingredients.description:
A discernibly red hot pepper.
Dried ones are often ground into powder.

Ingredients.name: Curative Horn
Ingredients.description:
A health food full of minerals.
Figuring out how to eat it requires some ingenuity.

Ingredients.name: Savory Pinion
Ingredients.description:
A thin, clear membranous wing.
It is mainly used to flavor dishes.

Ingredients.name: Leathery Tail
Ingredients.description:
A well-developed muscular tail.
Though troublesome to cook, it has an excellent flavor.

Ingredients.name: Juicy Bone
Ingredients.description:
An essential ingredient for soup broth.
It is used in numerous dishes.

Ingredients.name: Gummy Eyeball
Ingredients.description:
A large gelatinous ball of...meat.
A healthy food most people wouldn?ft poke with a stick.

Ingredients.name: Lucky Fang
Ingredients.description:
A sharp, jagged, saw-like fang. Once ground into a fine
powder, it is used to spice up dishes.

Ingredients.name: Monster Carapace
Ingredients.description:
The tender meat inside the shell is a real prize.
Being quite lean, the flesh has a light taste.

Ingredients.name: Beast Flesh
Ingredients.description:
Monster flesh with a slight odor.
The more you chew it the better it tastes.

Ingredients.name: Fish Fillet
Ingredients.description:
Fish with a rather sinewy texture.
It?fs quite tough to chew for being light white meat.

Ingredients.name: Tender Poultry
Ingredients.description:
Monster meat with a rather ordinary flavor. Its leanness
makes it a popular ingredient among women, however.

Ingredients.name: Clear Gelatin
Ingredients.description:
A tasteless, scentless gelatinous strand.
It melts in the mouth like a smooth froth.

Ingredients.name: Bird Egg
Ingredients.description:
A giant egg the size of a child?fs head.
Prized in the East as a revitalizing agent.

Ingredients.name: Fish Egg
Ingredients.description:
A fun food that pops in the mouth.
It is a popular ingredient in Eastern cooking.

Ingredients.name: Prickly Seed
Ingredients.description:
A seed covered by a host of tiny thorns.
Saut?ing it in a frying pan really brings out the flavor.

Ingredients.name: Smelt
Ingredients.description:
A small freshwater fish easily caught for sport.
If battered and deep-fried, it can be eaten head and all.

Ingredients.name: Liberl Carp
Ingredients.description:
An omnivorous whiskered fish living in lakes.
Although it has a peculiar smell it is great in many foods.

Ingredients.name: Rainbow Trout
Ingredients.description:
A medium-sized fish with iridescent lines on the sides of
its body. Best cooked while it's fresh!

Ingredients.name: Tiger Rockfish
Ingredients.description:
A beautiful fish with a vivid orange belly.
It tastes best if salted and grilled on a stick.

Ingredients.name: Salmon
Ingredients.description:
A fish that goes upstream to lay its eggs.
It is a well-known edible fish with flavorful pink meat.

Ingredients.name: Practice Weapon
Ingredients.description:
Lacking in the power department,
but better than nothing.
